Tyrael saw the smoking crater the ship had dug in the ground.

Tyrael: Slag=
! Predacons are there! There has been a shot fired too.
Kaiser, get ready t=
o fight...

He swooped down and was diving at the two predacons, recognizin=
g one
of them as one of those who helped to defend his former ship.

Tyrael=
: So... she was a spy... clever plan. Too bad it worked only
once. TRANSFOR=
M!

He broke his dive mere meters away from the bots, sending massive
gusts=
 of dust in the air.

Tyrael: I am Tyrael, of the Tripredacus. You seem wor=
thy, unlike these
treacherous loosebolts.
